name: MountWashingtonObservatoryWeather
0:
”Alexa, ask Mount Washington what is the weather?”
”Alexa, ask Mount Washington what is the forecast?”
”Alexa, ask Mount Washington what was the weather on September 6th 1979?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mount washington
Developer Terms of Use
des: From the Home of the Worlds Worst Weather! Now you can get current weather information directly from the Mount Washington Observatory at summit of Mount Washington in New Hampshire. You can also ask what the weather was for any day from 1935 to present as well as listen to our higher summits forecast. Ask for a random fact or about Marty the summit Cat. The forecast is a must listen for anyone hiking the Presidential Range of the White Mountains of New Hampshire.
